version_description: Now enjoy our new and improved Funds Transfer service with live exchange rates when transferring funds to your own accounts or third party accounts.

Get access to cash at over 200 shops with Standard Chartered Mobile Banking App ! Always  hunting  for an ATM ?, you can now get cash at  selected neighbourhood shops or mini marts. No purchase is needed. Just tap on ‘Get Cash’ and then tap on ‘soCash’ and proceed to get cash from shops near you.

Physical tokens are a thing of the past. With our latest security upgrade, you can make your mobile device your token to authorise your logins and all your banking transactions! Our all new welcome screen also allows you to stay up to date with your finances with the Balances, Transactions and Inbox Notifications features. Banking online is now quicker, more convenient and secure.

Need Travel Insurance to secure peace of mind during you’re travels? With our latest update Enjoy the ease of buying a Travel insurance anytime and anywhere with SC Mobile Singapore. Just a few simple clicks and receive a travel cover instantly.

Download this app today!
